fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Consumers, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Data Protection, insolvency, Capital Markets Union, Access to finance, Credit Information, Public Sector Information, Open and big data
organisation_name: Federation of European Business Information Services (FEBIS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
FEBIS is the federation of leading Business 
Information Services Providers and Credit 
Information Agencies. Today it has developed 
into an organization comprising 80 full 
members involved in providing both 
business & consumer credit reports 
(including scoring), debt collection services 
and marketing information services of 
national and international importance. 
Supported by a combined workforce of over 
25.000 employees, FEBIS members and 
associate members generate over 1, 3 trillion 
million business reports annually for over 1,6 
billion European organizations, providing 
these clients with business support for the 
provision of credit and other commercial 
services.  More information on 
FEBIS at www.febis.org
